channel.title: 614 Rune-Revival || Korasi || Gmaul || HC || DFS || Pking Multi/Unsafe/Funpk
channel.description:
Introduction: Rune-Revival is known to be a 614 SpawnScape remake. Currently we are still in beta but are expanding to build our playerbase. Our server is very stable and is hosted on a VPS(currently until upgrade is available). Skilling plays an important role because you will be able to earn a lot of money that way. As for our SpawnScape remake:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com]Home || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/play]Play Now || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/vote]Vote || Rune-Revival[/url]
[img]http://rune-revival.com/status/1.jpg[/img] [img]http://rune-revival.com/status/2.jpg[/img] [img]http://rune-revival.com/status/3.jpg[/img] [img]http://rune-revival.com/status/4.jpg[/img] [img]http://rune-revival.com/status/5.jpg[/img] [img]http://rune-revival.com/status/6.jpg[/img]
More coming soon
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1klA6.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com]Home || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/play]Play Now || Rune-Revival[/url] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qgacD.png[/img][url=http://Rune-Revival.com/vote]Vote || Rune-Revival[/url]

item.title: 614 Rune-Revival || Korasi || Gmaul || HC || DFS || Pking Multi/Unsafe/Funpk
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Sup guys, I see that you’re using Dark Rune as your template, or atleast the unofficial modified blue one made by a user at R-S. Nice to see that you guys love it so much. Please consider putting back the original footer with it’s original content inside. You may however add your own credits but the lines provided with the template in it’s original state must stay unaltered.

PS: You have 48H before I contact your host. (I don’t want be a d*ck but yea)

Greetz,
The_Ammo_Bandit

Read full topic
item.source: 614 Rune-Revival || Korasi || Gmaul || HC || DFS || Pking Multi/Unsafe/Funpk

item.title: 614 Rune-Revival || Korasi || Gmaul || HC || DFS || Pking Multi/Unsafe/Funpk
item.dc:creator: @Brooklynn Brooklynn
item.description:
@Brooklynn wrote:

Your website has been taken from Rune-server.

*The Footer will not be altered. You may not remove anything from the footer. You can however add your own footer regarding copyright on content/images you deliver.
*This template was designed by me, do not claim is at yours.
*You will not re-destribute this without permission.
*This template was designed by me, The_Ammo_Bandit AKA IlluZive.

You have broken these rules.

TheAmmoBandits footer was removed.

Read full topic
